text: Far Out may refer to: * Far Out (book), a 1961 collection of science fiction stories by Damon Knight * Far Out Recordings, UK based record label specializing in the music of Brazil * Far Out (album), 1999 album by Tadpoles * "Far Out", a song by Blur from their 1994 album Parklife * Far Out Man, a 1990 comedy film written, directed by and starring Tommy Chong * Farout, a temporary nickname for the distant trans-Neptunian object 2018 VG18 * FarFarOut, a temporary nickname for a distant trans-Neptunian object
title: Far Out
